name: Taped Together
description:
This is a very simple 2 player co-op game. I hope you like it.
Warning: Flashing Images

To play you will need the following things:

  • 2 Players
  • A keyboard
  • Some Tape

Special Thanks to Aaron for helping with playtesting
Sound Effects by Nick Bowler https://opengameart.org/content/various-sound-effects-from-rubiks-race (CC-BY 3.0)
